ComicInfo.Title: Darkest Hour
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Los Angeles dawn breaks, a mortal woman lays dying in it's golden light. Her name is Sakkara and she carries deep inside of her the sleeping demon Purgatori! Even now, as she struggles to live, fallen angels, powerful vampires, and a warrior from a once proud, now crumbling kingdom, are mobilizing to hunt down the woman who would be the Blood Goddess. Chaos! Comics is proud to present the story of one woman's struggle to overcome mortal fear and regain her rightful power in a world that wants her dead. From Joshua Dysart, writer of the cult hit Violent Messiahs, comes a new kind of Purgatori parable: the tale of Darkest Hour!
Note: Dan Schaefer used Alistar Vincent alias.
